channel.title: Comments on: If I Give Credit, It’s not Copyright Infringement, Right?
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Fair Use 101 – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Fair Use 101 – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] nothing to do with fair use. It is not relevant to any of the fair use factors. As I noted in my last column, credit is often given in practice, but usually as it’s a condition of a license (i.e. an […]
